import React from 'react'
import {Segment,Comment,Icon,Label} from 'semantic-ui-react'

class NewsFeeds extends React.Component{

    handleLikeClicked = event =>{
        event.preventDefault();
        this.setState({like: !this.state.like })
    }
    
    state ={
        like: false
    }

    render(){
        const {like} = this.state;
        var i = [1,2]
       
        return(
            <React.Fragment>

            <Segment>
      
      {/* <Comment.Group >  
        <Comment style={{width: '100%'}}>
          <Comment.Avatar as='a' src='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/b4339e6c847f4f25822532330320548e?d=identicon' />
          <Comment.Content>
             
            <Comment.Author >LamSonhai</Comment.Author>
            <Comment.Metadata>
              1:00pm
            </Comment.Metadata>
            <Comment.Text content='to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3to day is a good day hí hí <3' />
  
           <Label attached as='a' onClick={this.handleLikeClicked} >
            <Icon  name='thumbs up outline' color={like ? 'blue' : ''} /> 1
           </Label>
          </Comment.Content>
         
        </Comment>
      </Comment.Group> */}
      

  </Segment>

  <Segment>
      
      <Comment.Group >  
        <Comment style={{width: '100%'}}>
          <Comment.Avatar as='a' src='https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/b4339e6c847f4f25822532330320548e?d=identicon' />
          <Comment.Content>
             
            <Comment.Author >LamSonhai</Comment.Author>
            <Comment.Metadata>
              1:00pm
            </Comment.Metadata>
            <Comment.Text content='to day is a good day hí hí <3' />
  
           <Label attached as='a' onClick={this.handleLikeClicked} >
            <Icon  name='thumbs up outline' color={like ? 'blue' : ''} /> 1
           </Label>
          </Comment.Content>
         
        </Comment>
      </Comment.Group>
      

  </Segment>
            </React.Fragment>
            
        )
    }

}

export default NewsFeeds
